org.ros.rosjava_geometry

Class LazyFrameTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ros.rosjava_geometry.LazyFrameTransform

  • public class LazyFrameTransform
extends java.lang.Object
    Lazily converts a Transform message to a Transform on the first call to get() and caches the result.

    This class is thread-safe.
